sentences.en: Carlson noticed another oddity; his plant had bloomed twice.
sentences.cn: 卡尔森注意到另外一件怪事：他的植物开了两次花。

sentences.en: Far up the west rim of the canyon, a coyote yipped twice.
sentences.cn: 远处峡谷的西缘，一只丛林狼嚎叫了两声。

sentences.en: He beamed: "Unbelievably, we have now made it to the final twice."
sentences.cn: 他开心地笑了：“真是不可思议，我们现在已经两次成功打进决赛了。”

sentences.en: He had to have everything spelled out twice over for him.
sentences.cn: 他不得不把所有事项都对他详细说明了两次。

sentences.en: He miskicked the ball twice at the edge of the penalty box.
sentences.cn: 在禁区边缘他两次将球踢飞。

sentences.en: He was questioned by police twice yesterday.
sentences.cn: 他昨天被警察审问了两次。

sentences.en: I popped my head round the door once or twice.
sentences.cn: 我有几次头撞到了门上。

sentences.en: None of our dinner menus are exactly the same twice over .
sentences.cn: 我们的晚餐菜单从没有完全重样的。

sentences.en: She vacillates between men twice her age and men younger than she.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫不决，不知道是该选择年龄比她大一倍的男人还是比她小的男人。

sentences.en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
sentences.cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

sentences.en: The figure of seventy-million pounds was twice as big as expected.
sentences.cn: 7,000万英镑的金额是预期的两倍。

sentences.en: The legislation has twice been rejected by the House of Lords.
sentences.cn: 该法规已经两次遭到上议院的否决。

sentences.en: The metal had been valued at twice or thrice its current price.
sentences.cn: 这种金属以前的估价是目前价格的两到三倍。

sentences.en: They are in twice daily radio contact with the rebel leader.
sentences.cn: 他们每天用无线电和叛军首领联系两次。

sentences.en: They employ 90 people, twice as many as last year.
sentences.cn: 他们雇用了90人，是去年的两倍。

sentences.en: They should think not twice, but thrice, before ignoring such advice.
sentences.cn: 对于这样的建议，他们应该反复考虑再决定是否拒绝。

sentences.en: Turner, however, putted superbly, twice holing from 40 feet.
sentences.cn: 然而特纳两次从40英尺处漂亮地将球轻击入洞。

sentences.en: Under the Constitution, you cannot be tried twice for the same crime.
sentences.cn: 依据《宪法》规定，不能一罪两判。

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 在第二次时；分两次
三思而后再决定做某事
